channel.title: Temporary Inactivity
channel.description:
[quote="BobDole81, post:1, topic:107595"]Well, I just wanted to let you know that I will be pretty inactive for roughly a month. I'm heading to England (west side of London if anyone's interested) on Tuesday, visiting and attending a family wedding. Before Tuesday, I'm driving down to Pittsburgh this evening for my graduation tomorrow (I've been attending a cyber school for the past few years, so the event isn't quite nearby :P) Along with my college placement tests scheduled right in the middle of all of this, I've kinda been busy as of late :). While away, I will probably have some time while there to check messages and such, but other than that my moderation activity will be limited until around the 6th of July when I return. [/quote]
Mentioned this to the other mods/admins the other day...thought I should let everyone know, as I don't want people to simply think that I've disappeared (as I have done in the past). I've still received a huge number of pms this past weekend, when I was away, but opefully this should cut it down a bit (somewhat wishful thinking, but one can dream, right? :))
Anyway, I shall return with my normal activity, then, in early July ;)

item.title: Temporary Inactivity
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

On another topic

Well, I just wanted to let you know that I will be pretty inactive for roughly a month. I’m heading to England (west side of London if anyone’s interested) on Tuesday, visiting and attending a family wedding. Before Tuesday, I’m driving down to Pittsburgh this evening for my graduation tomorrow (I’ve been attending a cyber school for the past few years, so the event isn’t quite nearby :P) Along with my college placement tests scheduled right in the middle of all of this, I’ve kinda been busy as of late :). While away, I will probably have some time while there to check messages and such, but other than that my moderation activity will be limited until around the 6th of July when I return.

Mentioned this to the other mods/admins the other day…thought I should let everyone know, as I don’t want people to simply think that I’ve disappeared (as I have done in the past). I’ve still received a huge number of pms this past weekend, when I was away, but opefully this should cut it down a bit (somewhat wishful thinking, but one can dream, right? :))

Anyway, I shall return with my normal activity, then, in early July

Read full topic
